work.title: Software Engineering Manager
work.description:
Started as Technical Business Analyst, transitioned into Front-End Engineer, and now lead engineering for client-facing planning platforms used across `Morgan Stanley Online` and `E*TRADE`. Currently manage a team of `12 engineers` and own technical direction, architecture, and delivery for `5` apps.

 Led the development of a unified planning platform, consolidating fragmented systems and saving `$2M+ annually`. More recently, Iâ€™ve focused on integrating AI into our development workflow, building reusable AI-assisted engineering patterns and launching internal bootcamps and workshops to help teams adopt AI effectively.

work.title: Founder
work.description: Founded mobile app helping food truck owners save time and money. Built and shipped end-to-end mobile and backend systems using `Flutter and Firebase`. Developed Garnish, our AI food truck advisor using `OpenAI` for menu pricing, permits, and operations guidance. Secured partner discounts with Square, Food Service Direct, and FLIP Insurance. Serving `150+` food trucks nationwide.

work.title: Co-Founder
work.description: Designed and built algorithmic trading systems using `Java`, `React`, and `AWS`, growing AUM to `$750K` in `18 months`. We exited in 2019.
